talk.utter: There's also evidence that children drive transmission. Shedding patterns makes no difference when you're in close contact for long periods of time

talk.author: did:plc:zhy73wow23zh5yzqcad72nzo
talk.utter:
People need to learn the difference between viral load and cumulative exposure risk.
It's ridiculous that we're expecting people to do their own risk assessments. So safest just to clean air as much as possible and wear a mask indoors. Outdoors too if crowded
